data.title: Thea Sørum - Marketing Manager Norway at BookBeat
data.meta_description: Thea Sørum has a diverse work experience spanning across various companies and roles.
data.text:
Thea Sørum has a diverse work experience spanning across various companies and roles. Thea currently works as a Marketing Manager for BookBeat since December 2021. Prior to this, they worked at OKTO as a Project Leader from June 2021 to December 2021, and as a Performance Lead from January 2021 to June 2021. Thea also had a role as a Digital Specialist at Precis Digital from August 2019 to September 2020. In 2019, they started their career as a Junior Digital Marketing Specialist at Dept Agency from January 2019 to June 2019. Before that, they worked as a Junior Digital Marketing Specialist at QuantAds from February 2018 to January 2019. Thea'sfirst work experience was as a Student Intern at JCP - Just Cruzin' Production from August 2016 to November 2016.

Thea Sørum completed their education history as follows:

From 2017 to 2019, they attended Copenhagen Business School and earned a Master of Science in EBA Strategic Market Creation degree. The field of study is not specified.

From 2014 to 2017, they also studied at Copenhagen Business School and obtained a Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration and Service Management.

In 2013, Thea Sørum attended the University of South-Eastern Norway and obtained a Bachelor's Degree in Økonomi og ledelse (Economics and Management).

Prior to that, from 2009 to 2012, they attended Fagerborg Videregående and completed generalized studies, earning an Almen degree.

In addition to their formal education, they obtained certification in "Understand & Communicate to Different Personalities" from MarketingLab Copenhagen in October 2017.
